text: Znayesh', chto iz vsekh lyudey samyye zhestokiye nenavistniki veruyushchikh Iudei i mnogobozhniki; i takzhe znayesh', chto boleye vsekh lyubyat veruyushchikh te, kotoryye nazyvayut sebya Nazaryanami: eto potomu, chto u nikh yest' presvitery i podvizhniki blagochestiya; i potomu, chto oni ne gordy
